member.name: T:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester
member.summary: Extend this class to perform Assembly-wide automatic tests and assertions.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.AssemblyType
member.summary: Return a type in order to target assembly you're testing.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.EnforceNullabilityAttributes
member.summary: Set this property to true to enable

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.GeneratedCode_UseXunitOutputBase
member.summary: Enables tracking of class / method coverage using test naming convention. See the output of AssemblyMissingCoverage.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.GeneratedCode_IncludeTraitTargetAttributes
member.summary: Enables tracking of Xunit Trait attributes directly targeting tested members. This is useful for tying tests directly to tested members, as well as being able to jump directly to the tested member from the test.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.GeneratedCode_IncludeInstanceProperties
member.summary: Enables inclusion of Test members for Class instance properties. Default is false.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.GeneratedCode_UsePartialClasses
member.summary: Enables generation of partial classes.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.GeneratedCode_UseNullabilityAttribute
member.summary: Enables the use of [CanBeNull], [NotNull] in code generation. Defaults to the value of EnforceNullabilityAttributes.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.NamingConvention_Format_Namespace
member.summary: Override the namespace format.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.NamingConvention_Format_Class
member.summary: Override the class format.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.NamingConvention_Format_Member
member.summary: Override the member format.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.TestAssemblies
member.summary: Override TestAssemblies to specify additional Assemblies to search for code coverage.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.AssemblyTypes
member.summary: All included types in covered Assemblies

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.Assembly
member.summary: Reference to the assembly being tested.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.TestAssemblyCodePath
member.summary: Returns the root directory of the Test Assembly project.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.GeneratedCodeFolder
member.summary: Override this property to set the directory generated code will be placed. The default is "Generated".

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.GeneratedCodeFile
member.summary: Override this property to set the file name generated code will be placed. The default is "LUnitGenerated.cs".

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.GeneratedCodeFolderPath
member.summary: Retrieves the folder path to place generated code.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.GeneratedCodeFullPath
member.summary: Retrieves the full file path to place generated code

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.EnableCodeAutoGeneration
member.summary:
Enables automatic code generation into the Test Assembly. Default is false.
Override other GeneratedCode properties to customize where generated code is placed.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.#ctor(Xunit.Abstractions.ITestOutputHelper)
member.summary: Create a new AssemblyTester

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.AssemblyStatus
member.summary: Returns a status of test coverage over the targeted assembly.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.GenerateAssemblyTestStubs
member.summary: Includes details about uncovered methods. Use the code provided here to automatically target missing methods.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.TypeAssertions(System.Type)
member.summary: Override this method to make assertions on every exposed Type in the assembly. This method will get called many times and all Exceptions and failed assertions will be added to the list.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.AllMemberAssertions(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Override this method to make assertions on every exposed MemberInfo in the assembly. This method will get called many times and all Exceptions and failed assertions will be added to the list.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.MethodAssertions(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Override this method to make assertions on every exposed MethodInfo in the assembly. This method will get called many times and all Exceptions and failed assertions will be added to the list.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.ParameterAssertions(System.Reflection.ParameterInfo)
member.summary: Override this method to make assertions on every exposed ParameterInfo in the assembly. This method will get called many times and all Exceptions and failed assertions will be added to the list.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.PropertyAssertions(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Override this method to make assertions on every exposed PropertyInfo in the assembly. This method will get called many times and all Exceptions and failed assertions will be added to the list.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.EventAssertions(System.Reflection.EventInfo)
member.summary: Override this method to make assertions on every exposed EventInfo in the assembly. This method will get called many times and all Exceptions and failed assertions will be added to the list.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.FieldAssertions(System.Reflection.FieldInfo)
member.summary: Override this method to make assertions on every exposed FieldInfo in the assembly. This method will get called many times and all Exceptions and failed assertions will be added to the list.

member.summary: Reports Exception #1, if it exists.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyTester.AddException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Add an exception to the list, only the first 10 will be reported in the test runner.

member.name: T:LCore.LUnit.ExtensionTester
member.summary:
Extend this type to test static class members using Attributes
This class is probably being removed in favor of AssemblyTester.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.ExtensionTester.RequireCoveragePercent
member.summary: Less than this amount of method coverage will result in a test failure.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.ExtensionTester.TestType
member.summary: The Type to test.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.ExtensionTester.TestAttributeAssertions
member.summary: Run all Attribute tests on the Type.

member.summary: ExtensionTester constructor

member.name: T:LCore.LUnit.MultiTestReporter
member.summary: Tracks and reports up to 10 testing errors from a single RunTests method.

member.summary: Implement RunTests to perform all testing

member.name: T:LCore.LUnit.XUnitOutputTester
member.summary: Extend this class to be given access to Xunit's ITestOutputHelper to send text to the Output window.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.XUnitOutputTester._Output
member.summary: Write text to the Test Output window.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.XUnitOutputTester.#ctor(Xunit.Abstractions.ITestOutputHelper)
member.summary: Output will be injected by Xunit

member.name: T:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyCoverage
member.summary: Represents Assembly coverage information, given an Assembly to be tested, along with any Test Assemblies covering it.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyCoverage.CoveringAssembly
member.summary: The Assembly being tested

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyCoverage.TotalCoverage
member.summary: The total coverage percent, a uint value from 0 to 100.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyCoverage.AssertionsMade
member.summary: Count of assertions made against the covered Type. This is determined by counting the number of occurrences of ".Should" and "Assert."

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyCoverage.TypeCoverage
member.summary: Information about the Type Coverage within the assembly.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.AssemblyCoverage.#ctor(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Reflection.Assembly[])
member.summary: Creates an AssemblyCoverage from an Assembly to be tested, along with any Test Assemblies covering it.

member.name: T:LCore.LUnit.ITestAttribute
member.summary: Interface denotes a test attribute. Used to determine which methods are tested and untested.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.ITestAttribute.RunTest(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Implement this method to execute the test. Make assertions here.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.ITestAttribute.GenericTypes
member.summary: Generic types defined on the current method

member.name: T:LCore.LUnit.TestAttribute
member.summary: Override this attribute to define a test case for a particular method.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.TestAttribute.RunTest(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Implement this method to execute the test. Make assertions here.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.TestAttribute.GenericTypes
member.summary: Generic types defined on the current method

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.Fluent.FluentExt.HaveAttribute``1(FluentAssertions.Types.TypeAssertions,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Asserts that the current System.Type has an attribute of type .
member.param: A formatted phrase as is supported by System.String.Format(System.String,System.Object[]) explaining why the assertion is needed. If the phrase does not start with the word because, it is prepended automatically.
Zero or more objects to format using the placeholders in because.
member.returns: An FluentAssertions.AndConstraint`1 which can be used to chain assertions.

member.summary: Provides static methods used for unit testing.

member.summary: Warning message included at the top of LUnit generated files.

member.summary: Attempts to resolve parameter types for a method test. This corrects parameter types, converts arrays to lists if needed.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.LUnit.FixObject(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Type,System.Object@)
member.summary: Attempts to resolve a single parameter object. This corrects parameter types, converts arrays to lists if needed.

member.summary: Retrieves an instance of a method delegate from a fully qualified string.

member.summary: Locates the method to be tested

member.summary: Locates the method to be tested. Its argument input is set to object.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.Assert.AssertionExt.AssertSource(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Object,System.Func{System.Object,System.Boolean}[])
member.summary:
Asserts that a method's source will match . Optionally, pass in to check the result further.
This is used for methods that manipulate the object they were called on, not the result (if any).

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.Assert.AssertionExt.AssertSource``1(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object,System.Object[],``0,System.Func{System.Object,System.Boolean}[])
member.summary: Asserts that a method's source will match . Optionally, pass in to check the result further. This is used for methods that manipulate the object they were called on, not the result (if any).

member.name: T:LCore.LUnit.TestExt
member.summary: Provides extensions to allow for method unit testing.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.TestExt.GetTestMembers(System.Type)
member.summary: Retrieves TestAttributes for type

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.TestExt.RunTest(LCore.LUnit.ITestResultAttribute,System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Execute an ITestResultAttribute and compare ActualResult with ExpectedResult.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.TestExt.RunTest(LCore.LUnit.ITestFailsAttribute,System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Execute an ITestFailsAttribute test and ensure failure matches the conditions defined.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.TestExt.RunTest(LCore.LUnit.ITestSucceedsAttribute,System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Execute an ITestFailsAttribute test and ensures the method succeeds.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.TestExt.RunTest(LCore.LUnit.ITestSourceAttribute,System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Execute an ITestSourceAttribute test and perform tests on the calling object (for extension methods).

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.TestExt.RunTest(LCore.LUnit.IValidateAttribute,System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Validates an IValidateAttribute, throwing a testing error if validation has any errors.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.TestExt.GetTargetingName(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a Tuple of strings representing the: Namespace, Class Name, Member Name to target the specified MemberInfo. Use this to directly target members for testing.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.TestExt.GetAssemblyMemberTraits(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Reflection.Assembly})
member.summary: Retrieves a list of Trait Values targeting members being tested.

member.name: T:LCore.LUnit.TypeCoverage
member.summary: Represents Type coverage information, given a Type to be tested, along with any Test Assemblies covering it.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.TypeCoverage.CoveringType
member.summary: The Type being tested.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.TypeCoverage.CoveragePercent
member.summary: The total coverage percent, a uint value from 0 to 100.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.TypeCoverage.AssertionsMade
member.summary: Count of assertions made against the covered Type. This is determined by counting the number of occurrences of ".Should" and "Assert."

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.TypeCoverage.MemberCoverage
member.summary: Information about the Member Coverage for all methods on the Type.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.TypeCoverage.TestClassLocation
member.summary: A Tuple representing the generated test member Namespace, Class, Method

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.TypeCoverage.TestMember_Namespace
member.summary: The suggested namespace for the generated test class

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.TypeCoverage.TestMember_Class
member.summary: The suggested class name for the generated test class

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.TypeCoverage.GenerateTestStubs(System.String)
member.summary: Generate test stubs for all types in the assembly.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.TypeCoverage.GetTestStub(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the empty test stub for this class. If all members are covered then an empty string[] will be returned.

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.TypeCoverage.#ctor(System.Type,System.Reflection.Assembly[])
member.summary: Creates a TypeCoverage object, given a Type to be tested, along with any Test Assemblies covering it.

member.name: T:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage
member.summary: Represents method coverage information, given a method to be tested, along with any Test Assemblies covering it.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.CoveringMember
member.summary: The Member being tested.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.CoveringMemberDeclaringType
member.summary: The class that declares the CoveringMember

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.TestResultAttributes
member.summary: All ITestResultAttributes declared on the member.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.TestSourceAttributes
member.summary: All ITestSourceAttributes declared on the member.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.TestSucceedsAttributes
member.summary: All ITestSucceedsAttributes declared on the member.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.TestFailsAttributes
member.summary: All ITestFailsAttributes declared on the member.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.TestBoundAttributes
member.summary: All ITestBoundAttributes declared on the member.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.AttributeCoverage
member.summary: The number of test attributes covering the member.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.TestedFlag
member.summary: True if the member has an ITestedAttribute defined.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.IsCovered
member.summary: Returns true if the member is covered in a Trait-targeted test, an attribute test, or a manual ITestedAttribute.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.MemberTraitValue
member.summary: The member trait value used for direct targeting.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.TestMemberLocation
member.summary: A Tuple representing the generated test member Namespace, Class, Method

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.TestMember_Namespace
member.summary: The suggested namespace for the generated test class

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.TestMember_Class
member.summary: The suggested class name for the generated test class

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.TestMember_Member
member.summary: The suggested member name for the generated test method

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.MemberTraitFound
member.summary: True if MemberTraitValue is found in the testing assemblies.

member.name: P:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.AssertionsMade
member.summary: Count of assertions made in the source code block. This is determined by counting the number of occurrences of ".Should" and "Assert."

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.GetTestStub(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}@)
member.summary: Retrieves the empty test stub for this member, if it is uncovered

member.name: M:LCore.LUnit.MethodCoverage.#ctor(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Reflection.Assembly[])
member.summary: Creates a new MemberCoverage object, given a Member to be tested, along with any Test Assemblies covering it.
